description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹世界上最新的光電科技發展及在台灣的相關光電產業。時間上規劃以第一小時介紹基本光電理論，第二小時介紹應用技術與實例。課程內容包括：1.雷射光與原理與應用， 2.雷射光與精密量測， 3.雷射光與機械人， 4.光電技術與半導體製造， 5.光資訊與光儲存， 6.光纖通訊系統， 7.紅外系統， 8.紫外線系統， 9. 雷射醫學應用， 10雷射光與國防， 11.光學設計與光學設計軟體， 12 光電科技與未來。
description.en: The course gives the outlook of the technology of Opto-electronics and the industry of Opto-electronics in Taiwan. The contents of this course are constructed as following：1. The principles and applications of Laser, 2. Laser and precise measurements, 3. Laser and robot, 4. Opto-electronics technology and semiconductor magnification, 5. Optical information and Optical storage 6. Optical fiber communication, 7. Infrared system, 8. Ultraviolet system, 9. Medical applications of laser, 10. Laser and defense 11. Optical design and software. 12. Opto-electronics and future.

description.zh: 一般認為台灣民間宗教信仰源於中國民間宗教傳說，此說法亦無可厚非，不過台灣民間宗教信仰極重要的特色，已不再是神教文化承接的問題，而是其已轉為在地的以實體寺廟建築場所，作為當地政治社會文化中心所發展出的民間信仰。本課程在讓同學了解台灣地區有哪些歷史悠遠的廟宇主神、事蹟傳說，以及其所帶動的宗教組織和信仰風情。課程包括：1.台灣原住民的巫術與神靈信仰、2.台灣的?時與節慶，如過年與元宵、清明與端午、七夕與普渡、中秋、冬至與尾牙等；3.台灣的主要神明信仰，如媽祖、觀音、關聖帝君、玉皇大帝、玄天上帝、清水祖師、城隍爺、地藏王、福德正神、五府千歲及王船祭等；4.台灣的主要宗教團體如齋教、一貫道、理教、天理教、軒轅教、天帝教、台灣靈乩、符籙學會、儒教學會、亥子道教等。
description.en: "Taiwanese folk religion" involves many dimensions, and it is one the most important applicable knowledge to local education. However, students in elementary and junior high schools still lack of the knowledge in this field. Therefore, the arrangement of lecture, camp, and religious construction regarding to the learning of Taiwanese folk religion is desirable. Hopefully, through all the effort, students could acquire more knowledge about Taiwanese folk religion, and share their learning experience on their daily lives. The main goal of the course is not only to improve the situation that our students have insufficient knowledge about folk religion, but also to help them apply the knowledge on the internet frequently. In addition, we will help students gain more information in this field and improve their learning quality of Taiwanese folk religion in Taiwan. This course include four fields: 1.The various gods that people believe in Taiwan 2.The Taiwanese custom and daily habits 3.The

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 美學是一門研究人類感性知識的學科。近代探索中國美學，旨在對古代中國人的美意識，包括基本概念、範疇、規律等，加以剖析歸納，儘可能以現代語言表述，準確闡明其在美學理論上之實際涵義。本課程擬就近年中國美學研究成果，擇取代表性單元作為介紹重點：一、	美、美學、審美心理要素二、	「美」「善」在文字上表現中國人原始的美意識三、	中國禮制、藝術在用色上所蘊含的文化特性四、	中國線文藝術的特殊趨向五、	其他重要美學議題
description.en: Aesthetics is the study of knowledge of perception of humans. Recent study of Chinese aesthetics focuses very much on the ideas of beauty, including basic concepts, scope and regularities, on which analytical and inferential research is performed to explicitly express what aesthetic principles imply through the representation of the modern language. The course is designed to introduce to the students the most typical achievements we have made in the past centuries on the Chinese aesthetics.1.	Psychological factors that influence beauty, the fields of beauty and aesthetics2.	The underlying ideology of beauty revealed by "Beauty" and "Virtue," when realized through the form of written language3.	The cultural properties that are reflected by the choice of color in the ancient ceremonies on various occasions as well as in the art 4.	The particular trend as is shown in the art of linear texts5.	Other important issues on Aesthetics

description.zh: 本課程以戰後臺灣政治與社會的變遷做為討論的重點，講授內容包括半世紀以來臺灣的民主政治、經濟發展、對外關係以及文教、社會變遷等。希望透過本課程的研讀，能讓學生對戰後臺灣的發展有較全面性的瞭解。
description.en: The course focuses on how the political and social changes take place in Taiwan after World War II. The discussion topics include: the democratic politics, economic development, foreign affairs policies and the changes--cultural, educational and social-- over the past half century in Taiwan. It is our hope that the students will get a far more comprehensive picture of the post-war development in Taiwan.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 本課程有系統概括性闡述動態地球科學的基本知識和理論。課程內容包括:地球簡介、地球在天體間的位置、地貌、全球熱量平衡、氣溫、水氣、降雨、風、氣旋、氣候、天氣、生態系統、水文、土壤、地球材料、岩石圈、板塊構造運動、火山、風化作用、塊體運動、淡水、流水地形、地形與岩石構造、風與浪地形、冰川地形、冰川期、土壤與生物等。
description.en: The contents of the course titled " INTRODUCTION TO EARTH SCIENCE " include : the earth; our place in the sun, geomorphology, the earth's global energy balance, air temperature, atmospheric moisture and precipitation, winds and global circulation, weather systems, global climates, global ecosystems, hydrology, global soils, earth materials, the lithosphere and plate tectonics, volcanic and tectonic landforms; weathering and mass erosion, fresh water of the continents; landforms made by running water, landforms and rock structure; landforms made by waves and wind; glacial landforms and the ice age; soil and biology.

name.en: An Anthology: The History of Taiwan

description.zh: 台灣史相關研究蓬勃發展迄今，有許多的著作重新被重視、翻譯與詮釋，這些可稱之為台灣歷史書籍之經典。言以經典未免沉重，令人望而生畏。還有一些書籍，是既有趣味又有意義，捧而讀之，數百年台灣風物民情地貌變遷流轉仿彿躍於紙上。本課程將介紹這些經典的、趣味的、有意義的台灣歷史名著，藉由數本好書，進而瞭解台灣歷史。
description.en: Since the study of the history of Taiwan has been in prosperity, a large number of historical texts have been newly translated and interpreted, thus gaining more importance. These texts can be categorized as classical volumes of the history of Taiwan. "Classical volumes" is a term that sounds serious-or rather frightening. But there have been existent a lot of other written resources-interesting and meaningful--exhibiting the vivid image of the people, geography, folk stories and the transition of time available in Taiwan for the past hundreds of years. This course focuses on these particular materials concerning the history of Taiwan-through the discussion of which, the history of Taiwan can be better understood.

description.zh: 唸社會哲學的主要原因在於，在社會的架構之內，從哲學的角度去探索一系列很根本的問題。它們包括﹕正義、公平、人權、自由、公民意識、市場與道德、科技與道德的關係等等。我們的探索是以哲學知識做為基礎，例如: 功利主義、康德的道德哲學、羅爾斯的正義理論，還有內格爾、多爾肯、與沈對公平理念的討論等等。由於這些問題與我們的福祉休戚相關，身為一個受過良好教育的社會公民，我們便需要具有社會哲學的知識。準此，我們可以了解社會是如何運作的，並且能夠對一些和我們個人利益乃至公共福祉相關的社會性議題進行反省，從而對它們做出正確的抉擇。
description.en: The main reason for studying Social Philosophy is that within the context of society, a number of fundamental questions can be answered from a philosophical perspective.  These include:  justice, equality, human rights, freedom, citizen consciousness, market and morality, and the relationship between technology and morality, etc. Furthermore, our investigation is based upon philosophical knowledge such as Utilitarianism, Kantian moral philosophy, John Rawls’ theory of justice, the debate of the idea of equality among Thomas Nagel, Ronald Dworkin, and Amartya Sen, etc.  Given these issues are directly relevant to our well-being and benefits, to be informed social citizens, we need to have knowledge of this subject.  Thus, we can know how the human society works, and being able to reflect upon these social issues that concern our personal interests and public welfare in an attempt of making good decisions for them.

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election.  Learning this course, students will be not only capable of cultivating the ability to read a news correctl

description.zh: 二十一世紀是中國人的世紀，全球最多的人口，第三大的土地，與台灣如此的近，政治、經濟、軍事、文化發展對台灣均有一定的影響。統一？台獨？無論如何，身為今日在台灣的知識份子，應對它有所瞭解。課程內容包括：中國共產黨的建立與發展、政制體制、教育科學文化發展、經濟展望、國防軍事建設、兩岸關係等。
description.en: This course is designed lets our students have a comprehensive understanding of the Mainland China. Introduced the developing history of Chinese Communism Party ; the organization of political ; the status of economics ; the development of science &　eductaion;the military construction; the policy of one country two systems;and the relationship of two - sides of straits ---。

description.zh: 勞動法包括與勞動市場、個別勞動關係及集體勞動關係等方面有關勞工工作權益的法律規範，透過本課程可以學習正確的勞動法律觀念和知識，同時培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，來保障並維護自己或他人的職場權益。
description.en: The legal specialty called Labor Law can be define as “the legal regulation of the labor market , individual labor relations and collective employer-employee relations. “labor market” pertains to market in which employers and workers exchange labor . Through this course , students can not only get correct concepts of " Labor Law " , but learn to protect their / others' rights in work place.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞與飲茶活動有關的文學名作，從而瞭解茶歷史與茶文化，認識歷代著名的茶人與茶事。並由欣賞茶以及相關的文物，體會飲茶的藝術與趣味。茶源自我國，然後逐漸成為世界性的飲料。因為飲茶活動富涵藝術與趣味的特質，茶也逐漸成為重要的社交媒介。在我國，茶結合了道家與禪學的思想，其實，茶不僅只是一種美味的飲料，茶道的理念更值得我們悉心探索，藉以浸潤生活的內涵。
description.en: This course aims at first making students acquainted with literature concerning tea by which a better understanding of tea personalities and anecdotes will be obtained and secondly, cultivating students' appreciation of a great variety of tea and cultural artifacts linking with tea by which interests in tea art will be kindled. Having been a luscious beverage brewed for some 3,000 years of Chinese history, tea now has a deep and far-reaching impact on the world. Since making tea illustrates the character of art and affords the delight of life, tea therefore build a bridge among all walks of life. Making tea, combined with Taoist School and Buddhist Meditation, at its uiumate attainment, is both an enjoyment and an artistic summation. The search for tea is a dual process of understanding tea's flavor as well as the thought with it.

description.zh: 21世紀全球化浪潮席捲人類生活各個領域，國家邊界正在消失，人們都是「地球村」的村民，並且已逐漸體認到無論是政治、經濟、文化或社會層面都受其他村民的影響。本課題擬從以上四個視角協助同學認知全球化問題，從而構思(總體面)國家的發展策略以及(個體面)企業的經營佈局對策。課程內容包括：全球化與國家主權(國家認同、國家職能)、全球化與國際分工(跨國公司、利益分配)、全球化與文明衝突(文化帝國、民族主義)、全球化與社會風險(公民社會、社會安全)、全球化與全球治理(秩序重建、利益共容)。
description.en: Globalization tide sweeps across each field of human life in the21st century. National boundaries are disappearing. People are all the villagers in the” global village”, and have realized gradually that they have been influenced by other villagers no matter politically, economically, culturally or socially. This course is designed to further students’ understanding on globalization issue from the above-mentioned four angles, thus help them shape both country’s development strategy and enterprises’ management planning. The course content includes: Globalization and state sovereignty (national identity, functions of the state), globalization and international division (trans-corporation, distribution of interests), globalization and civilization conflict (cultural imperialism, nationalism), globalization and social risk (citizen's society, social safety), globalization and global governance (order- rebuilding, interests-encompassing).

description.zh: 投資是有報酬和風險的，不同金融產品有不同的報酬率和風險，例如：存款報酬低風險低，期貨報酬高風險高。如何將資金做一個妥善分配，選擇合適的一組金融商品，就能避孼不必要的風險而得到不錯的報酬率。投資學課程可以使學習者了解如何以投資學理論評估各種金融商品的可能風險和報酬率，再依投資者經濟能力選擇合適的金融商品進行投資。對於理工科系人員，了解投資學課程是增強理工科系人員理財素養的重要課程之一。
description.en: Investment has its rewards and risks; different financial products have different rates of return and risk. For example: deposits have low rewards with low risks; futures have high rewards with high risks. With making a proper allocation of funds and choosing the right set of financial products, one can avoid unnecessary risks and get a good rate of return. Investment courses make students understand how to apply financial instruments theory to assess possible risks and returns in various financial instruments, and then invest the suitable financial products according to the economic capacity of investors. For science and engineering personnel, understanding the investment in science and engineering courses is one of the important programs to enhance financial literacy personnel.

description.zh: 網路資源運用是現代人生的一部份，但不當利用網路或為犯罪工具的例子屢見不鮮，本課程擬探討網路誹謗、網路色情、駭客攻擊以及網路交際的安全性等，期望在個案的討論中培養學生正確利用網路資源的觀念，進一步落實法治教育。
description.en: To use internet resources is already part of the life for every modern people; however, the cases of using internet as the criminal tool are not rare. Thus, this course is going to discuss the law issues that are spread out from the application of internet, which including: internet slander, internet pornography. Hacker attack and electronic bank, electronic shopping, electronic business. Hope we can help our students to develop the right conception to use internet resources through case study, and further more to carry out the law education.

description.zh: 資訊法律課程將讓同學了解網路資訊社會中各層面的相關法律議題。本課程內容著重於各種網路法律問題，例如資訊安全、網路契約的訂定、網域名稱、數位化著作權、商標權，隱私權以及電腦犯罪種類及防治的介紹。另外，本課程也以個案方式，敘述電腦資訊的相關法律問題，並從中了解虛擬世界與現實世界的法律規範，同時測試自己是否具備足夠的資訊法律知識，能夠在快速變遷的資訊社會中立足與發展。
description.en: The course of Information Laws is designed for the students to familiarize such legal issues in most of the aspects available in the current world as information security, internet contracts, domain names, digital copy rights, trademark ownership, individual privacy and the genre & prevention in relation to computers. In addition, we discuss individual cases to further understand the nature of legal issues concerning computerized information. Hopefully, we learn the legal disciplines existent in the virtual and real worlds; besides, the students are supposed to equip themselves with sufficient legal knowledge so that they can survive and thus keep growing in the ever-changing information society.

description.zh: 著作權法係為保障著作人著作權益，調和社會公共利益，促進國家文化發展，所特別制定之法律。該法所稱著作包括：語文著作、音樂著作、戲劇、舞蹈著作、美術著作、攝影著作、圖形著作、視聽著作、錄音著作、建築著作、電腦程式著作等。著作權的保障內涵則包含因著作完成所生之著作人格權及著作財產權。本課程將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於著作權的瞭解。
description.en: Copyright Act  is specifically enacted for the purposes of protecting the rights and interests of authors with respect to their works, balancing different interests for the common good of society, and promoting the development of national culture. "Works" of this act, include the following:1.Oral and literary works.2.Musical works.3.Dramatic and choreographic works.4.Artistic works.5.Photographic works.6.Pictorial and graphical works.7.Audiovisual works.8.Sound recordings.9.Architectural works.10.Computer programs. "Copyright" means the moral rights and economic rights subsisting in a completed work.The discussion in the course covers theory and examples，to enhance a deeper understanding of Copyright for the students.

description.zh: 在上學期開設，一學期，兩學分。斷限：始於日據時期，止於七十年代，以台灣白話文學之生發演進史程為主軸。範圍：涵蓋文字改革運動，第一次鄉土文學論戰，第二次鄉土文學論戰，  本土化文學思想研析、及作品選讀。要求：學期報告一份、期末考。
description.en: Period: From the Japanese sovereighty to the 1980's; emphasizing the history of the vernacular literature. Topics: The movement of the language revolution; the first controversy of folk literature; the second controversy of folk literature; analysis of the literary localization movement and the study of selected works.Requirements: One term paper and a final exam.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹科學技術之重要成就及其發展，使學生對科技有一具體的認識。社會變遷、思考模式、文化發展等，影響科技的發展極大，而相關問題的探討，可使學生認識科技發展的特色及其優缺點，並引導其思考何以近兩三百年來科技衰落的原因，并尋求正確的發展方向。
description.en: he course will systematically introduce the development and important achievements of ancient technology so that students will have a profound understanding of it.  Besides, since social changes, the mode of thinking, cultural development, etc. are closely related to the development of technology, these topics will also be discussed.  In this way, students will have a more comprehensive understanding of the characteristics, advantages, and disadvantages of technology.  Hopefully, they may try to inquire why the development of technology has lagged behind in these 300 years and may start to find a perspective course for the development of technology in the future.

description.zh: 近百年是台灣政治、社會、經濟、文化劇烈變動的時代。從清季西洋勢力的大舉進入，清廷推動自強新政以應變；爾後台灣淪入殖民統治，在近代化及同化政策下台灣的變革更為迅速；而從台灣光復迄今，不論是經濟發展、政治民主、教育普及等等，使台灣進入已開發國家之林。這些變革與發展，是台灣民眾集體努力的總成績，但其間也有許多引領風騷的人物，他們分佈於各個不同的領域，歷史家對他們的評價或正或負，成就與貢獻的多寡也有爭議，不過透過這些人物事蹟的探討，可了解個人與群體、時代、環境的互動關係，也更能掌握近百年台灣史發展的脈絡。
description.en: Never has Taiwan experienced so big changes in politics, social structures, economics and cultural movements as in the last century. In Ching Dynasty, the Westernized power entered and the Ching court initiated innovative campaigns to work against; then Taiwan under the colonial rule by Japan, modernization  and colonialism changes Taiwan a lot ; in past half century KMT's rule has advanced such great deal in the fields of economic development, democracy and education as to stand among the developed countries. Though it is the collective efforts of the Taiwanese people that contribute to the alteration and development, there exist some of the outstanding figures in various fields, who might receive positive as well as negative comments from the historians and who might initiate a controversy concerning their contribution. This course explores the most influential individuals and the events that happen around, in the hope to understand the interaction between each of them and the groups

description.zh: 這e世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題:1.溝通管理定義與本質元素。2.溝通管理內涵分析。3.學習個人溝通能力。4.學習溝通程序。5.e化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6.學習全球化溝通科技工具。7.團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8.塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生明瞭中國及西洋人生哲學的歷史發展，並介紹人生哲學的內在涵義，分別探究人的意義、特性、人性論、真善美聖等問題；兼及人生哲學的當代意義：包括各種人生觀、生命的尊嚴、愛與婚姻及修養等探究。使知、情、意能融為一體，藉以確立個人理性的生命追尋目標。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to enable students to realize historical development in Chinese and Western philosophy of life by introducing the inner connotation of philosophy of life and studying the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life, humanism, virtue, good and beauty, etc..  Furthermore, this course introduces the meanings of philosophy of life in relation to the contemporary life, such as various kinds of philosophy of life, dignity of life, love and marriage, moral cultivation. It aims to integrate knowledge, passion and intention, for setting up the goal that personal rational life should pursue.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 植物與人類生活息息相關，人類選擇植物加以栽培生產，用來提供食、衣、行、及健康所需，而農耕的發達則與人類文化及社會的演變互相影響。本課程將由各種不同角度介紹，包括植物特性、栽培管理技術、自然環境、地理、人文、社會、政治、經濟等方面，與植物生產的關係。主旨希望同學能了解人類與植物間相依相存的關係，並進一步關懷人類、植物、與自然環境之間的相處之道。
description.en: Plants supply major food for all kinds of living organisms.  This lecture is prepared to introduce the relationship between the crop plant and modern food  production.  The whole spectrum will be viewed from the aspect of the chacteristics of platns, the nature environment, science, human civilization, society, politics and economics, etc..  Hope students can concern and respect the mutuality between plants and human.

description.zh: 使同學具備良好的造形能力，對於今後從事各類型之設計、繪製圖表等均有幫助。教學內容包括筆法及明度練習，室內靜物寫生，室外樹木、建築物之寫生。教學方法：先練習運用鉛筆，使其表現各種筆觸、輕重，再要求造形之準確度，達到形態和質感的表現正確，以及構圖有美感的能力。先由老師示範，而後同學練習
description.en: Equip students with the ability of styling so that their designing and drawing ability can be improved. The teaching material used for this class includes stroke and chiaroscuro, drawing of still life, and nature painting outside. Teaching method: Practice how to use a pencil for the demonstrating various touches in light and heavy strokes.  Students shall learn how to perform  precise styling,  correct expression of formation and personality, and a beautiful configuration. The instructor will give a demonstration first and then students shall follow and learn.

description.zh: 何謂法國文化？文化對法國人而言代表了生活，每一分每一秒法國人都在創造編織文化，生活的點點滴滴具體象徵法蘭西文化與民族特性。隨著歐盟的成立與運作，地域文化的發展，東西歐文化交流與非歐洲移民文化的包容，再加上法國文化政策以發展地方文化為標的，使得20世紀的法國文化有別於過去的面貌。本課程將不同主題以單元方式探討，學習者可由中認識、了解法國文化的多元、形成方式，進而分辨與其它文化的差異點。此外，學習者需要自備主題參與討論、探討。主題準備方式是以在既有的書面或官方網站資料中衍生個人創意與想像力。
description.en: What is French Culture? For the French people, culture represents daily life, every minute and second the French is creating and weaving their culture, thus strengthening the symbol of French Culture and its identity. With the establishment and development of the European Union, France underwent a phase of decentralization and immigration; greatly influencing and changing the visage of 20the century French culture from before. Therefore, this course aims to stimulate discussion of the chapters through different subjects. Through this method, the students will be able to recognize and understand more about the diversity and formation of French culture; in addition, they will be capable of telling the differences between French culture and other cultures. During this course, the students are required to choose a subject to discuss and research. Note that in preparation of their final orientation, the information within must be based on photocopied texts or official websites in order to d

description.zh: 從歷史之反省中，探索人類對未來之創造潛力。詮釋競爭與和諧，個人與國家，現實與理想之雙軌教學，期能栽培專業人力與宏觀之人材。啟發學生比較歸納、以古鑑今的思維能力，使之獲得客觀有用的歷史學識。
description.en: This course is designed to help students explore human creative potential for the future in the light of historical introspection.  This course is an interactive instruction on the following topics: competition vs. harmony, individual vs. nation, reality vs. ideality.  Emphasis will be placed on training students' logical reasoning in analysis, synthesis, comparison, induction, and deduction so that they can acquire useful historical knowledge in an objective way.  In so doing, we hope to cultivate perspective professional intellects.

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

notes: 社會向度(鄭又平老師)/社哲向度

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

description.zh: 本課程主要在從人生內在活動面向使學生明瞭宗教與人生的關係。首先探究人生的意義與特性，次則經由對宗教哲學，比較宗教學與宗教現象學的瞭解，來分析人生的問題。內容特別強調文化對人生的影響，宗教乃是深層文化原則所繫，同時人生問題也能引發宗教的適應與發展等等。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to approach of " Action Immanent ", enabling students to realize the relation of religions and life. First, to study the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life. Second,through the understanding of "Philosophy of Religion "、" Comparative Religion " and "Phenomenology of Religion ", to analyze the problems of life. Emphasis is on culture and the influence of life, as religion is a foundation supporting culture where problems of life can stimulate the adaptation and development of religion.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車、碳回收等；「節能科技」則包括節能住宅、變頻空調等主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。教學目的：綠色科技為21世紀最重要的科技，除了維繫人類在地球上的永續生存外，發展綠色科技更是對抗目前全球金融危機的唯一途徑。本課程希望透過介紹綠色科技，進而喚醒大家對環境的關懷與愛護，更重要的是透過介紹綠色科技的原理，讓更多年輕人瞭解綠色科技，期待綠色科技能在台灣真正技術生根。
description.en: This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, carbon recapture, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.  教學目的：    Green technology is the most important technology in the 21st century. It does not only influence the human ever life on the earth, but is also the unique road against the present global financial crisis. This course wishes people to care for and love the earth by way of understanding the green technologies. Moreover, this course hope to let more young people

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

name.zh: 國際專業證照研訓實務講座
name.en: Practice Seminar of International Professional Certification

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本「國際專業證照研訓實務講座」課程針對國際性專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國際專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。本學期專門培訓學生通過Microsoft 國際證照之Word 與Excel為目標，以協助同學建立跨領域與國際化能力之專長。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of international professional licenses in management, nurture students to participate in international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate international professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation. This semester will help students to pass the licenses of Word and Excel, and further to obtain the interdisciplinary expertise with international capabilities.

notes: 資財二與最後一哩合開，電腦教室

name.zh: 行動通訊網路原理與實務
name.en: Mobile Telecommunication Networks Principles and Practice

description.zh: 本課程旨在增進電機工程研究所學生對行動電話通訊網路工程實務之了解與分析設計之實作能力，期望學生之所學能與產業科技發展的脈動同步。 內容主要包括： (一) 電信基本概要簡介 (二) 行動電話通訊系統之演進與發展 (三) 蜂巢式行動電話基本網路架構與功能 (四) 臺灣GSM網路運作實例研討 (五) 無線網路之規劃設計與工程實務 (1)信號涵蓋之電腦模擬與路測技術 (2)通話流量與系統容量分析 (3)頻率規劃與干擾研究 (六) 系統優化與網路維運管理實務 (七) 電信公司營運機房與網管中心實地參觀 (八) 射頻規劃之電腦軟體模擬實驗: 在系裡經費許可之前提下提供學生實習網路規劃。
description.en: This course aims to improve EE graduate student's knowledge in mobile telecommunication networks with emphasis on the engineering practice, as well as to train the students to be able to design and analyze the mobile telecommunication networks. The course content includes the following: (1) Fundamentals of Telecommunications (2) Mobile telecom systems evolution and future trend (3) Cellular network structure and functions (4) Taiwan GSM networks case study (5) Wireless networks planning, design and engineering practice 1. RF planning: computer simulation and road test 2. Traffic and capacity analysis 3. Frequency planning and interference study (6) System optimization and network management (7) Site-visiting to Telecomm company's operation center (8) Planning/design simulation using computer software if funding is allowed.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、衡量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposa

notes: 限博班修讀，碩班須經授課老師同意

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

notes: 文學向度，限外籍生修讀

description.zh: 介紹複合材料之種類、構成材料之特性、製造方法及其機械力學。主要讓同學瞭解複合材料之特性及設計分析方法，其材料結構行為與傳統均質等向性材料之差異，以能將複合材料應用到最適當之場合。課程內容包含：複合材料之定義及其特性、纖維強化材及基材之結構和特性、強化材及基材介面特性、複合材料之機械性質、複合材料微觀力學、積層板分析理論、積層板之強度、短纖維複合材料之機械性質、複合材料結構之非破壞性檢測
description.en: The course describes the definition, types and fabrication processes, and mechanics of composite materials.  The contents focus on the characteristics and design method of composite materials.  The differences between the traditional homogeneous, isotropic materials and the composites will be iterated in order to realize the best utilization of composite materials.  The contents are: definition and characteristics of composites, fiber reinforcement and matrix, interface and interphase, mechanical properties and strength, micromechanics, lamination theory, short-fiber composite, non-destructive testing.

name.zh: 社會新鮮人的職場生涯規劃

description.zh: 本課程介紹SWOT分析、個人夢想、價值觀、潛能開發等工具及手法。幫助我們將個人夢想、價值觀、人生目標與行動策略協調一致，去除不必要摸索，整合個人最大的優勢與資源，取得職場生涯規劃之成功的機會。本課程以案例討論為主題，實際帶領學員運用工具及手法，學習掌握的個人人生目標，進一步的更有效的幫助年輕人快樂的就業、達成幸福的發展生涯。
description.en: This course introduces the SWOT analysis, personal dreams, values, potential development tools and methods. It helps us for coordinating the action plans of personal dreams, values, goals and strategy to remove unnecessary finding. This class also integrates the best personal strengths and resources to obtain a opportunity for a successful career plan. This course is focused on the case discussions and lead students to learn to how to achieve personal life goals of more effective and happier career development.

notes: 工管四甲乙最後一哩合開，限大三以上，限120人

description.zh: 排程主要在規劃與排定活動執行的優先順序，以使各項資源得到最佳的運用。本課程主要在介紹生產排程的基本理論與方法，使學生奠定排程研究與排程實務問題解決的基礎。
description.en: Scheduling consists of planning and prioritizing activities that need to be performed in an orderly sequence of operation. It is a tool that optimizes use of available resources. This course focuses on the basic concept on scheduling. The purpose of this course is to guide the students to learn the basic methodologies of scheduling, and to understand the scheduling application aspects.

name.zh: 顧客關係管理與商業智慧
name.en: Customer Relationship Management and Business Intelligence

description.zh: 顧客關係管理主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利，其內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。商業智慧(Business Intelligence, BI)，是企業利用現代資訊技術收集、管理和分析結構化與非結構化的企業資料與資訊，創造和累積企業知識與見解，以改善企業決策品質與採取有效的企業行動，進而提升企業各方面績效。由基本現場管理(Shop Floor Control)需求談起，然後介紹製造資訊分類與收集技術（包括RFID），也將包括資料庫與資料倉儲觀念，最後介紹BI於顧客關係管理之應用。課堂中也將輔以目前市面上商用BI套裝軟體，並將其專業上相關資訊在此系統上實際應用，體驗BI對企業之重要性。
description.en: The objectives of Customer Relationship Management (CRM) are to study the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes concepts and context of CRM, consumer behavior, customer data mining, CRM system, planning and management of CRM projects, performance measurement of CRM. Business intelligence (BI) systems refer to applications and technologies which gather and analyze data about company operations. It then provides a comprehensive correlation of those factors, such as metrics on sales, production, internal operations, and helps managers to make better business decisions. This course focuses on applications of BI in CRM, with the introduction of shop floor control concepts and data collection techniques such as RFID, along with database and data warehouse concepts. Hands-on experience in BI software implementation is also emphasized.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This seminar focuses on report writing of research, group study, and training of students' research ability.

name.en: The Principles and Applications of Machine Vision

description.zh: 機器視覺檢測乃結合光學設備 ` 影像處理 ` 與電腦輔助計算處理 , 藉由擷取受測物影像之特徵進行後續各種應用(如檢測 ` 辯識等)。 為確保機器視覺應用之精確度及速度,受測物影像必須依用途進行不同前處理以突顯特徵 , 後以不同之演算法則判斷之擷取特徵是否符合應用要求。 機器視覺近年來大量使用於各產業,除提昇製造業之產品品質外,對人身安全認證之生物科技亦功不可沒 。
description.en: Machine vision has been extensively used in inspection and biometrics in recent years. This course provides the fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision for graduate students. Increasing the knowledge and capability in machine vision for a well-trained industrial engineer is the final goal of this course.

description.zh: 針對存貨理論之簡單介紹，課程內容為確定性模式之經濟批量，連續性與週期性盤點策略，動態性模型與多階段系統。
description.en: Introduced simply in view of the goods in stock theory, curriculum content economy of batch for definite pattern, continuous and periodic inventory strategy, dynamic model and multi-stage system.

description.zh: 流體動力與化學動力學，Rankine-Hugoniot 關係，擴散火燄與液滴燃燒，層流火燄，紊流火燄，引燃、焠熄、可燃極限，噴霧燃燒
description.en: Fluid Dynamics and Chemical Kinetics, Rankine-Hugoniot relations, Diffusion flames and Droplet Burning, Laminar Flames, Turbulent Flames, Ignition, Quenching and Flammability Limits, Spray Combustion.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(一)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(I)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

notes: 與進修部在職專班合開，葉老師(603)、陳老師(B01)

description.zh: 探討數位化測驗與評量之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括有數位化測驗與評量之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、設計與發展、系統、教學管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。另外尚包括數位化另類評量，如電子化學習檔案、數位化檔案評量、數位化概念圖、電腦化同儕互評等。
description.en: To explore theories, design and practical application of digital test and asessment including their theortical fundamentals, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, design and development, system, instructional management, practical cases, and future trends etc...Moreover, digital alternative assessments such as e-portfolio, digital portfolio assessment, digital concept map, and computer-based peer assessment are also included.

notes: 博碩課程, 日夜合開

name.en: Statistical Data Analysis Using Computer Software

description.zh: 訓練學生應用統計套裝軟體進行資料整理、陳列、分析、解釋及統計推論，以建立學生使用統計套裝軟體進行統計資料分析之能力。課程主題包括敘述統計之圖表製作、假設檢定、信賴區間、變異數分析和迴歸模型。學期末，學生應能以標準統計分析程序，分析商業資料，並根據統計分析之結果，建議可行之企業決策。
description.en: This course reviews and expands upon core topics in probability andstatistics through the study and practice of data analysis. Topicsinclude numerical and graphical summaries of data, hypothesis testing,confidence intervals, analysis of variance, and regression. Uponcompletion of this course, students should be able to think criticallyabout data and apply standard statistical inference procedures to drawconclusions from such analysis.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

name.zh: 創意廣告與微電影製作

description.zh: 課程主要目的為結合實際廣告或微電影發想與製作，針對文創商品，人文議題，或文化主題，做一實際的設計發想與製作。透過廣告訊息的創製或微電影的拍攝，將整體構思概念，透過素材選擇，表現手法，鏡頭語言，了解整體廣告與微電影發想與製作過程，將相關創意具體實踐於數位影音作品。
description.en: The main purpose of the course is the advertisement or microfilm think and production, for the cultural and creative goods, cultural issues, or cultural themes, to make a practical design thoughts and production. Created by shooting advertising messages or microfilm, the whole idea of the concept, through material selection, performance techniques, and camera language, designers understand the overall advertising and microfilm distribution and production of thought process, specifically related to the practice of creative works in the digital audio and video work.

name.zh: 互動式電子書設計與製作

description.zh: 課程主要目的為結合數位產業發展趨勢，針對文創商品，人文議題，或文化主題，做一實際的設計發想與製作。透過電子書的設計與製作，將整體構思概念具體實踐於數位作品中。
description.en: The main purpose of the course is a combination of digital industry trends for the cultural and creative products, cultural issues, or cultural themes, to make a practical design thoughts and production. Through conduct e-book design and production, the whole idea of the concept can be created in the digital works.

name.zh: 生物科技產品品質安全與管理法規
name.en: The Introduction to Quality,Safety and Regulation of Biology

description.zh: 生物科技產業已是二十一世紀世界各國的重要產業，我國亦視生技產業為繼電子產業後的新興產業，然而生物科技產業與其他科技產業的差異，在於用於人體或具醫療用途的生技產品，除了品質管理外，更須考慮安全與效能，我國與世界各國對於生技產品大都以建置相當程度的法規環境，以有效的管理生技產品並確保人之安全。因此，對於生技產品特有的管理制度以及安全與效能等特殊需求若無正確的認識，將非常不利產業發展。本課程將以疫苗、血液製劑、基因工程製劑、診斷試劑、人體細胞組織產品等目前已研發成熟與正發展中的生技產品為例，從產品設計、品質與製程管制、效能與安全評估、法規環境與管理制度到我國管理方式，以深入淺出的方式做完整的介紹，此外，課程中也將針對生技產業面臨的生物安全問題及其需要的設施、生技產業的挑戰與機會等議題，進行充分的講述與討論。透過此課程，期望學生建立在生技產品品質管理、製程管制、安全評估及產品登記等方面的基本概念，以培養生技產業目前極度缺乏的製程規劃人材。
description.en: In the 21th century, the bio-technological industry has been the important industry in the world.  It is also the most emergent sunrise industry following the electronics industry in Taiwan.  The bio-technological industry is very different from the other technological industries.  The biological products intended for human therapeutic use have to face the needs of safety and efficacy except product quality.  Taiwan government and other countries have established the regulatory framework for biological products to ensure their safety and efficacy.  Therefore, the realization of the management system for biological products is very useful to industry development.This course uses the examples of vaccines, blood products,  recombinant DNA products, diagnostic devices and human cell and tissue-based products to introduce the design control, quality control, process control, evaluation for safety and efficacy and regulatory framework in Taiwan.  The course also discusses the issues of fac

description.zh: 講授並整合設計評價之基本理論。訓練學生針對產品之開發動機、消費者需要(needs)、市場策略、機能佈局、人機介面訴求、造形策略及創意，評估產品設計過程中思考與決策之品質，進而形成改善設計品質之建議。（本課程非本人所提議，以上課程概述僅供參考，並請提議老師指教。）
description.en: Lecture on theory and practice of Design Criticism. Discussions lead toanalysis of quality and effectiveness in design philosophy and practiceamong steps of product development process, including marketing strategy,fulfilling uses' needs, product functioning, ergonomics emphasis and stylingaccent.

name.en: Design Theory and Research in Germany

description.zh: 赴德研習之準備課程；科學理論、計畫理論、傳播理論、美學等創新設計實務相關之理論與研究，以建立專案研發設計之理論基礎。
description.en: This course provides theory and research of design in Germany related topics on Science Theory, Plan Theory, Communication Theory, Esthetics etc. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and simulation verification.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-馬來文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Malaysia

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家特別是東協五國經濟成長迅速，藉由傳授東南亞四小語以協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖並促進台灣與東南亞國家之間的經貿關係。本課程旨在培養學生的基本溝通能力，運用馬來語來與當地馬來母語者打招呼、了解馬來文化、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等，以此來協助學生前往馬來西亞就業作為兩國的經濟橋樑。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to introduce and equip our students not only with the basic local language but also to understand the local culture so as to strengthen the economic tie between Taiwan and the Asian countries and to enhance the employment opportunities of our students in these Asian countries.This course aims to help students to understand and develop basic communication skills by utilizing Bahasa Malaysia (Malaysian language) to communicate with Malaysian in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, etc. Historical and geographical backgrounds of Malaysia and their local cultures will also be introduced.

notes: 土木四甲乙與最後一哩合開，限30人

name.zh: 國際觀培養:泰國文化與語言(一)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language I

description.zh: 1. 在臺灣與東南亞交流日益增加的情況下，東南亞語言的學習需求也會隨之提高。而「泰國」所擁有的社會經濟條件優勢，以及泰國政府有意推動的文化創意產業，相信也將為臺灣帶來一陣「泰語學習風潮」。 2. 課程以培養基礎泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通基本實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。 3. 泰語教學方面，秉持聽、說、讀、寫同時並進的教學理念，由字母的發音、寫法、唸法、聲調、順序及拼字系統的學習開始，奠定良好的泰語基礎，搭配最常用的單字、句型、文法與日常實用會話，使學生可以拼寫、閱讀泰文短文，並能以泰語進行日常對話。 4. 泰國文化方面，以專題的方式，講述政治、經濟、社會、地理、歷史與文化等各個層面的泰國，呈現出不同於一般刻板印象中的泰國，培養學生對泰國的正確認識及態度。本學期先針對泰國目前的經濟與文化面進行概說；下學期則探討泰國歷史、地理、政治與社會。
description.en: 1. With the interaction between Taiwan and Southeast Asia getting more and more frequent, the need for learning Southeast Asian languages has been highly increasing. Thailand owns the advantages of social economy; moreover, Thailand government intends to promote cultural creativity industries. Hence, learning Thai definitely becomes a new trend in Taiwan. 2. This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking basic Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc. 3. In terms of learning Thai, listening, speaking, reading and writing, these four skills are equally important. Student will be trained to learn all these four skills together. At first, s

name.zh: 國際觀培養:東協商務、文化 I
name.en: Development of global perspective: the series of ASEAN Community I

description.zh: 東南亞地區向來為台灣的重要經貿夥伴，而東協十國已決定於2015年效法歐盟成立經濟共同體(ASEAN Community)，並積極尋求與日本、中國、南韓、印度、澳洲與紐西蘭等六國，簽署雙邊自由貿易協定，希望未來能建立一個30億人口、年經濟產值達九兆美元的「東亞自由貿易區」。希望藉由此次課程，讓學生瞭解東協成立後，臺灣的未來產業與市場發展，充實學生未來就業所需知識與技能。並藉由東南亞文化講座，開啟學生的國際視野，鼓勵學生實際透過度假打工、遊學、自助旅行、公益旅行、壯遊體驗等方式赴海外體驗學習，使其得以在經濟不景氣的時代下擴展未來的就業版圖。
description.en: Southeast Asia has been the most important economic and trading partner with Taiwan. Association of Southeast Asian Nations decided to found ASEAN Community in 2015, which takes European Union as a model. At the same time, it is vigorously looking for signing the Bilateral Free Trade Agreement with Japan, China, South Korea, India, Australia and New Zealand for the purpose of establishing an East Asia Free Trade Zone which accounts for the population of 3 billion of people and 9 trillion of GDP. We hope that we can make students learn more about this rising market after the establishment of ASEAN Free Trade Area (AFTA) by introducing them various aspects of Southeast Asia, including its cultures by means of taking part in a working holiday, a study abroad program, a backpacking tour, voluntourism, or a Grand Tour. After this class, students are expected to learn about new employment opportunities in this era of recession and high unemployment rate.

notes: 時間3、4節，為期9週，限100人，與創新與創業學程合開

description.zh: 為落實本校教學卓越計畫八大核心能力與「企業家的搖籃」之校本精神，本課程以創新與創業之企業家精神為基礎，透過多元化的講座課程，帶領學生了解經營管理、溝通表達與領導統御之內涵，以啟發學生解決各類經營管理問題的能力，開拓更寬廣的視野及思維，建立未來企業家的領導特質與求新應變的能力。本課程安排多家企業參訪，藉由實際參訪與交流溝通，深入瞭解企業經營的精髓與創新求變的精神，以培育學生具備未來成功創業家之管理、思辨與邏輯的能力。
description.en: In order to implement the school spirit of the eight core competencies of Teaching Excellence Project and "cradle of entrepreneurs," this course aims to foster future entrepreneurs by enhancing entrepreneurship based on innovation and entrepreneurship, through a wide range of lecture courses lead students to understand connotation of management, communication and leadership, ability to inspire students to solve various management issues, to develop a broader perspective and logical thinking, build the capacity of leadership traits and novelty strain of future entrepreneurs. This course is arranged to visit a number of enterprises, with the actual visit and communicate in depth understanding of the essence of the business management and innovation spirit for change, to nurture students have the ability of future successful entrepreneurs of management, reasoning and logic.

name.zh: 設計思考：時代精神中的建築
name.en: Design Thinking: Zeitgeist is more than Building

description.zh: Design Thinking是一個創意與設計的方法，根據各種設計主題之特性尋求解決方案，創造更多的可能性。本課程為輔導學生在建築設計的議題發想、策略擬定、空間構思、實作執行的操作過程中，導入與國際趨勢同步的跨領域空間觀察與論述，省思當前時空環境下作為專業的空間實踐者所應扮演的角色。透過系列演講、工作營以至於實作練習的進行，養成具備國際觀點、社會關懷與實務接軌能力的設計師。
description.en: DESIGN THINKING looks at principles of design and ways of thinking leading to ideas and creative solutions. The course focuses on the fields of architectural design process and its integration with practice techniques. To synchronize with international trends, a discourse platform is intended to set up within the scope of social issues, social design and social practice. Through experiential learning, class discussion, lectures and workshops, students are expected to learn problem-solving, practice design-skills and develop international vision.

notes: 建築與最後一哩合開然部分演講於週間其它時段80人

description.en: (1) To realize mesh concept and construct the mesh. (2) Flow analysis of melt plastic filling. (3) Packing analysis of pressure distribution in the mold. (4) Cooling analysis of temperature distribution in the mold. (5) Warp analysis of injection molding parts.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-北科菁英‧放眼國際
name.en: Feast for the global perspective —Going beyond the Campus from Experiences of NTUT Alumni

description.zh: 本課程邀請歷屆傑出校友分享其國際實務經驗，進而激發同學追求國際化的渴望，強化學生對人生願景的規劃，使其在國際交流活動上有更為積極的作用。
description.en: This course invites a number of outstanding alumni to share their experiences and thoughts on developing global perspectives and to instill in students the meaning a global citizen in today's world. The goal is to inspire students to engage in international activities and, ultimately, to plan a future with an international mindset.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，面對這波網路創業風潮，應如何在茫茫網海中嶄露頭角？網路上沒有絕對正確的答案，最好的學習方式就是彼此分享成功經驗。這次講座特別邀請國內知名的網路創業達人，分享他們的創業故事。走吧，跟著這次講座來趟冒險吧！
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor? There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 本課程著重實務性訓練Pro/ENGINEER系統之操作能力，輔以幾何模型學理論說明CAD技術的發展現況。首先介紹CAD概論，說明電腦輔助設計技術的趨勢，培養學生具備現代數位產品開發概念與同步工程之意義；然後教授Pro/ENGINEER系統的各部分功能、指令操作，並以設計專題引導學生建立實務應用，強化學生的操作與應用能力。
description.en: Introduction of the fundamental of 3D CAD technology and the manipulation of the software packages, Pro/ENGINEER, for product design in a concurrent engineering environment. By the practical projects, the students are trained more adept skill and application experience.

name.zh: 財經專業證照實務講座
name.en: Practice Seminar of Finance and Economic Professional Certification

description.zh: 為加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本財經專業證照實務講座，針對金融市場常識與職業道德、普通證券商業務員、理財規劃人員等專業證照開設輔導課程，希望學生能夠學習基本的金融市場常識與金融從業人員應具備的職業道德，並進一步瞭解理財的流程，同時就個人或家庭的收支、儲蓄、住屋、子女教育、以及退休生活等規劃皆予明確分析，並舉實際案例詳予說明並闡釋各種相關理財金融機構之角色與功能，逐一介紹各類理財工具之特性及其有效之運用方法。對於未來有志從事金融機構財富管理業務之從業人員及大學校院相關系所學生，極適合作為其日常業務之參考、進修或準備應試之用。俾培育學生參加並通過國內外財經專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of professional licenses in finance and economics, nurture students to participate in professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate finance and economics professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation.

notes: 需90人大教室，資財一與最後一哩合開，限90人

description.zh: 管理會計是整理和產生各種會計資料和情報以幫助各階層的管理人員完成管理任務。本課程共分三篇，第一篇是會計資料與企業決策之間的關係，其中共有五章分別介紹決策步驟與收集資料及選擇資料的近代會計方法論。第二篇是如何運用各項資料於企業決策，其至中包括四章，針對各項，各種特殊型態的決策需求，找出所需各項資料。第三篇是有關決策系統之各項計畫與控制制度，其中各章針對決策資料如何實用化與協調化。全文強調有關會計人員、經濟人員及財務人員皆可透過本書各項功能而達到分析與管理目的。
description.en: Management Accounting: Management Accounting is used to produce Accounting Information to help manager accomplishing managerial missions. In this Course, there are three subjects as follows: 1) The relationship between Accounting information and Business Decisions. 2) How to apply all types of information into Decision Model. 3) The planning and controlling of managerial decision will also be discussed, and 4) Case study

description.zh: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於展現以上空域上一系列線元組成之陣列天線系統，其可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線系統在空域上所遭遇之干擾。因其具備自動干擾消除之能力，其已是未來無線通信(微波)系統之主流。而本課程之主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本架構概念及處理程序，可為有興趣於通信工程之學生建立實際陣列信號處理概念及系統設計之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他類似領上。
description.en: The primary object of this course is to present the fundamental concept and treatment for spatial signal processing dealing with interference encountered in wirelwss communication by using an adaptive array. It is also the additional purpose of the subjects to provide the analllytic techniques used to predict the performance in other new applications.

description.zh: 這是一門設計為 "軟硬體合成的電子實習" 課程。對於一個電路的實作程序如下:(1). 首先使用C/C++來計算和設定，電路的零件值。(2). 再使用 Spice simulator，對該電路來做諸如 DC operating point、Transient Analysis、AC Analysis、DC Sweep、DC Transfer、Noise、FFT、Spectrum Analysis、等必要的分柝，以證明該電路的規格與可行性。(3). 將電路佈局、並銲接到實驗板上。(4). 使用 PC/Analog Discovery Module 對實驗板上的電路來做測試和除錯，並且跟Spice 所獲得的數據來作比較。本課程的設計除了每週 3 小時的教室講解、示範和討論外，並提供每位同學一個Analog Discovery和實作教材，以供同學課外每週約 8~12 小時的實作之需。全學期約 12 個項目，除了必須完成有關實作外之紙上作業，還有期中及期末測驗，以檢定學習之成效。
description.en: This is a design for the "integration implementation" course (iLAB).  The course consists of the following:(1)  Use C / C + + to calculate and set the value of circuit components;(2) Use SPICE to perform DC operating point, Transient Analysis, AC Analysis, DC Sweep, DC Transfer, Noise, FFT Spectrum Analysis, and other point analysis to show that the circuit is feasibile; (3)  Layout the circuit and solder to the prototype board;(4)  Use PC / Analog Discovery Module on the circuit board to perform experiments to test and debug and compare results obtained via SPICE for comparison. The course is designed in addition to three hours of weekly lecture, recitation, demonstrations and discussions, to provide each student an Analog Discovery and teaching materials for students outside the classroom requiring approximately 8 to12 hours per week outside the classroom. Approximately 12 projects in addition to homework as well as midterm and final exam to test aptitude and covered material wi

description.zh: 本課程為「電磁波」課程之延伸，以電磁波輻射特性之探討為主,可作為研究所「電波傳播」、「無線通訊系統」與「智慧型天線」等課程基礎。預修科目: 電磁波、電波工程導論中文概述1.行動通訊系統中之天線基本觀念2.天線重要基本參數3.電磁波輻射特性4.線型天線5.微帶天線6.天線陣列設計7.天線量測
description.en: 1.General view of Antenna in Mobile System2.Fundamental Parameters of Antenna3.Radiation Characteristics of Electromagnetic Wave4.Linear Wire Antenna5.Microstrip Antenna6.Antenna Array Design7.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎2.影像的轉換3.影像的加強4.影像的復原5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮7.影像的分割與特徵抽取8.影像的表達及描述9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

description.zh: 本課程將探討語音訊號的相關的各種基礎知識與處理技術，包括語音辨認，語音合成與口語對話系統等，並將檢視數個具目前最先進技術的系統，使學生能建立語音信號處理技術之基本知識及能力。課程內容包括：*語音的產生，語音訊號聲學特性與語音知覺的原理*語音分析*語音辨識*語音合成*口語對話系統*目前最先進技術系統*相關進階議題
description.en: In this course, we will introduce fundamental speech signal processing techniques, including speech recognition, speech synthesis and spoken dialogue system and examine some state-of-the-art systems.Content:*Overview of Speech Processing Techniques*Speech Production, Acoustic Phonetics and Psychoacoustic Phenomena*Speech Analysis*Speech Recognition*Speech Synthesis*Spoken Dialog System*State-of-the-Art Systems*Selected Advanced Topics

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 1.MOS元件工作模式及MOSFET原理 2.微小MOSFET的額外考慮 3.矽晶圓的生長 4.擴 散 5.離子植入 6.氧化處理 7.CVD技術 8.微影術 9.蒸鍍與濺鍍 10.光罩製作 11.CMOS IC製程

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 可穿戴式應用已成了全球科技產業的新寵兒之一。因此，漸漸地，穿戴式裝置已成為人們生活用品的一部分。本課程討論可穿戴式系統導論、無線感測網路導論、生醫資訊模組設計、可穿戴式教學平台之設計、情境感知遠距監控與定位救援手仗之設計、非視覺型之不穩步態偵測分析設計、自行車玩家生醫資訊守護神設計、遠距醫療照護系統設計、與客製化谷歌智慧型眼鏡設計。本課程主要達成跨領域的高度整合應用訓練課程。
description.en: Wearable applications have been become one new darling of the global technology industries. Hence, gradually, the wearable devices have become part of people's daily necessities. This course will discuss the topics of “Introduction of wearable system, Introduction of wireless sensor network, Design of Bio-information module, Design of wearable teaching platform, Design of Context-Aware Tele-monitor and Position-rescue Staff, Detection Analysis and Design for Unstable Gait with Non-vision Base, Bicycler-Player Bio-information Guardian, Design of Tele-Medicine care system, and Design of customized Google Smart-glass”. This course is highly integrated applications to achieve interdisciplinary training.

name.zh: 軟體定義網路(SDN)架構與應用服

description.zh: 介紹SDN網路與現今網路架構、並說明其主要應用諸如雲端運算應用虛擬網路應用、虛擬儲存應用、集成解決方案及資料中心整合SDN。
description.en: To introduce the architecture of software-defined networking and hardware-defined networking and outline SDN applications such as Cloud computing application、Virtual networking 、Virtual storage 、Aggregation solution and SDN- integrated Data center 。

It consists properties of light, concepts of solid state physics, modulation of light, display devices, lasers, photo-detectors, fiber optical wave-guide and optical communication systems.

Steat Mafnetic Fields.7.Time Varying Fields and Maxwells`Equations.8.Plane Electromapnetic Waves.9.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines.10.Wavef uide and Carity Resonators.11.Antenna and Radiation Theory.

name.en: English practice and training for engineers

description.zh: 本課程旨在有效提升學生運用英文於工程實務之技巧與能力。主要包括： 一、撰寫個人英文履歷及簡歷。      二、閱讀通俗科技文章的能力(含心得報告)。      三、使用英文進行簡報的技巧與能力。      四、撰寫英文簡報資料的技巧與能力。      五、撰寫工作報告的技巧與能力。本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course aims to effectively promote students' capabilities of using English for engineering issues, particularly focused on the following: 1.To write his/her curriculum vitae and resume. 2.To read scientific/technical magazines and handbooks. 3.To present his/her work by English. 4.To write and edit presentation material(s) by English. 5.To construct and write a concise report by English.The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(一)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 創新講座－產品/服務創新實務
name.en: Innovation Lecture - product and service innovation Practice

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產業專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創產品與服務創新策略之實例教學，策劃符合技術發展企業「整合跨領域資源與知識」經營體質，並滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品及服務，使學術與產業互動交流縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course through lectures and conferences with industry experts, will also teach about existing cases of product and service innovation practice. aim to teach about solving the problem of economic development of Taiwan through the way and method of innovation design; and to plan out the “Integration of interdisciplinary resources and knowledge” operating conditions fitting with technology development enterprise and products according needs of markets and users. This course also aims to increase interactivities of academic and industry.
